thread.title: Brilliant place to Stay near Gare Du Nord
thread.title_full: Brilliant place to Stay near Gare Du Nord - Review of Hotel de l'Europe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Piyush T
title: Brilliant place to Stay near Gare Du Nord
text:
Within walking distance of Gare du nord station , it is a brilliant hotel for a short stay. Rooms are neat and it seems that the bathrooms are newly renovated. We had decent views of the streets outside. It's a quiet and comfortable hotel. Most important thing is the warm reception you will get when you enter this place. Lovely feeling . It's a non smoking hotel and eating food inside is not allowed I think. So just keep that in mind
Tip : Check Google maps on the exit from the station .
